I will sing my heart out at the concert, and hopefully find someone to love after that.
I'm a free spirit who loves to express myself through my clothing.

i ve never been a fan of sports.

participant_2.background:
I juggle for a living in a circus, and I come from a small town in the Midwest.
since my dog died i am incomplete.
My father is a wildlife veterinarian and my mother is an animal rights activist.
I was too scared to come out to my parents on my last birthday, so I just spent the day with my friends.
Others think I'm weird because I'm a health nut but still love sweets.

content.text: I'm excited to go to a concert tonight, I hope to find someone to love there!
That sounds fun! I'm a juggler for a living, I come from a small town in the Midwest. What do you do for a living?
I started my own business, I'm a free spirit who loves to express myself through my clothing.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to start my own business.
What's something that you love to do?
I love to watch my dolphins swim in the ocean, I think they're so beautiful.
That sounds amazing! I've never been to the ocean before, I'd love to go one day.
You should! It's so beautiful. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to concerts, I love to sing my heart out. I hope to find someone to love there!
That's great! I'm not really a fan of sports, but I love to juggle for a living.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to juggle.
It's not as hard as it looks, you should give it a try!
I just might! I'm always looking for new hobbies to try.
